meanings.definition: To rely or depend on someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She lippened on her best friend to help her with the project.
meanings.sent2: He lippened on his umbrella to keep him dry in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The cat lippened on the mouse to share its cheese.
meanings.sent4: The tree lippened on the sun for its daily dose of light.
meanings.sent5: The student lippened on his notes to pass the exam.

meanings.definition: To trust or have confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The child lippened on his parents to keep him safe.
meanings.sent2: She lippened on her instincts to guide her through the maze.
meanings.sent3: The detective lippened on his magnifying glass to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: The athlete lippened on her training to win the race.
meanings.sent5: The farmer lippened on the weather forecast for planting his crops.
